content: Smart Data Collective Honored as a Top Data Science Resource SDC Staff March 6, 2015 March 6, 2015 1054 Views Share on Facebook Tweet on Twitter + Smart Data Collective was selected as one of the Top 50 Data Science Resources by NGDATA. Smart Data Collective was ranked eighth in the category of best data science blogs. Smart Data Collective was selected as one of the Top 50 Data Science Resources by NGDATA. Smart Data Collective was ranked eighth in the category of best data science blogs. NGDATA mentioned posts by Mithun Sridharan , Martyn Jones and Eran Levy as being especially helpful and said that “Smart Data Collective serves as a platform for recognized, global experts to share their expertise and insights.” NGDATA explains that their list is meant to help users navigate information about data science: Because the field of data science is so broad and sometimes challenging to navigate, we’ve compiled a list of 50 of the most helpful data science resources on the web. Whether you’re a student or new professional working in the field of data science, these resources are valuable for discovering the latest employment opportunities, finding tutorials for the processes and systems you’re using on a daily basis, learning hacks and tricks to boost your performance, and connecting with other professionals in your field. We at Smart Data Collective are honored to be included among data science resources such as the Berkeley Institute for Data Science and Booz Allan’s data science website. Most of all, Smart Data Collective would like to thank our contributors for making our site a great resource. Our community thrives because of your passion and expertise. Thank you! Smart Data Collective Honored as a Top Data Science Resource

SDC Staff March 6, 2015 March 6, 2015
1054 Views
  • Share on Facebook
  • Tweet on Twitter
  • +

Smart Data Collective was selected as one of the Top 50 Data Science Resources by NGDATA. Smart Data Collective was ranked eighth in the category of best data science blogs.

Smart Data Collective was selected as one of the Top 50 Data Science Resources by NGDATA. Smart Data Collective was ranked eighth in the category of best data science blogs. NGDATA mentioned posts by Mithun Sridharan, Martyn Jones and Eran Levy as being especially helpful and said that “Smart Data Collective serves as a platform for recognized, global experts to share their expertise and insights.”

NGDATA explains that their list is meant to help users navigate information about data science:

Because the field of data science is so broad and sometimes challenging to navigate, we’ve compiled a list of 50 of the most helpful data science resources on the web. Whether you’re a student or new professional working in the field of data science, these resources are valuable for discovering the latest employment opportunities, finding tutorials for the processes and systems you’re using on a daily basis, learning hacks and tricks to boost your performance, and connecting with other professionals in your field.

We at Smart Data Collective are honored to be included among data science resources such as the Berkeley Institute for Data Science and Booz Allan’s data science website.

Most of all, Smart Data Collective would like to thank our contributors for making our site a great resource. Our community thrives because of your passion and expertise. Thank you!
